attributes.action: allow the death penalty for convicted pedophiles and child murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i belive that it is now time to bring the death penalty for convicted pedofiles and child murderers
the state of the art technology for discovering and proving crimes is outstanding and has proved effective in helping solve many cases,
when a childs life is taken or destroyed then the other person has lost all their human rights i belive, so please sign this and make the world a safer place to live for all our future children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
